channel.title: Tools Guide :: CIS 301 Textbook
channel.description: GitHub account First, you will need to create a GitHub account here. If you already have one, you can use your existing account. Your GitHub account will need to be set up to use two-factor authentication (a new requirement). When logged into your GitHub account (link above), click your icon in the upper-left corner (it will say “Signed in as…(your account name)”). Select “Settings” and then “Account security”. Scroll down until you find “Two-factor authentication”.
